root.name: Carl Lewis Athletics 2000
root.description: OverviewCarl Lewis Athletics 2000 is a track field game developed by Planet Interactive Development and published by Ubisoft for the Game Boy Color platform. Carl Lewis Athletics 2000 was never released outside of Europe.Ubi KeyCarl Lewis Athletics 2000 uses the Ubi Key feature. The Ubi Key feature is built into some of the Ubisoft games for the Game Boy Color. The Ubi Key allows players to connect to another game that also uses the Ubi Key by way of the infra red port on the Game Boy Color.
